messages.title: BRITAIN NEEDS TO CHANGE DIRECTION
messages.content: The Conservative Government wants this election to be about 'stable government'. But to do what? Austerity goes on and on. Our public services are on their knees: roads, hospitals, education are not coping. Anyone who knows the devastating impact this is having on people's lives. AND government funding for local authorities will stop from 2019. We will have to increase taxes ourselves locally or lose vital public services in Herefordshire and Bromyard. Without the will to back big business, this is an impossible ask. AND the Conservative government says it wants a hard Brexit. But does anyone in their right mind imagine that will improve the cost of leaving Europe. They do not have any idea what it means just as they have no strategy to understand the immediate impact. The Liberal Democrats want to stay in the Single Market for access to jobs and investment and put education, our economy, our environment and the future of our children first.

issues.brexitEurope: The Liberal Democrats want to stay in the Single Market for access to jobs and investment and put education, our economy, our environment and the future of our children first.
issues.economy: The Conservative Government wants this election to be about 'stable government'. But to do what? Austerity goes on and on. Our public services are on their knees: roads, hospitals, education are not coping. Anyone who knows the devastating impact this is having on people's lives. AND government funding for local authorities will stop from 2019. We will have to increase taxes ourselves locally or lose vital public services in Herefordshire and Bromyard. Without the will to back big business, this is an impossible ask. The cost of leaving Europe.

community.content: Jeanie lives in Bishops Frome, near Bromyard, with her family and runs a small farm and vineyard producing wine, cider and brandy. Jeanie is very active in local, voluntary organisations in our community.

politicalExperience.achievements: Advising businesses on EU policy-making and legislative processes.

nonPolicyAttributes.employment: Jeanie spent much of her career as a senior consultant in European public affairs, living in London and Brussels, advising businesses on EU policy-making and legislative processes.
